# Iowa House Pricing 

## About
We will be taking a look into the different price ranges of houses sold in Ames, Iowa from 2006-2010. Our goal is to predict the selling price of houses during this time period in Ames Iowa. The data was collected by Ames, Iowa Assessors Office.

Lets start by loading the data into a dataframe called "iowaHousing"
```{r}
iowaHousing <- read.csv("IowaHousing.csv")
```
The data consists of 2930 observations and 81 variables.
